comment: It's good if you're just starting out with video editing, but after a while I noticed that whenever I cut out a section of the video, the audio in will be delayed. It is possible to fix, but it is really annoying, and requires extracting, cutting, and moving all the audio to make it in sync. Also whenever I export the video, the actual video is delayed so the audio sometimes happens before it is shown.
key sentence: Export the video, leading to the actual video being delayed, causing the audio to play before the corresponding video is shown.
the function of activity: This activity focuses on editing, exporting, adjusting, and managing the audio and video elements of multimedia templates.
